wikipedia_page.main: Linda Sole (born 1950 in Swindon, Wiltshire, England) is an awarded and prolific British writer of romance and suspense novels since 1980, she also writes under the pseudonyms of Lynn Granville, Anne Herries, Emma Quincey, Cathy Sharp and Juliana Linden. In 2004, her novel A Damnable Rogue  won the Love Story of the Year Award by the Romantic Novelists' Association.

response: *Emma Robinson, series of novels by Linda Sole
